name: Bachelor10
tag_list: bachelor-party, travel, tips, destinations, vegas, new-york-city, los-angeles, san-francisco, atlanta
overview:
Bachelor10.com aims to be the premier destination for all things bachelor party.

For guys ready to spend a memorable weekend, Bachelor10.com is a one-stop shop for all the resources required to plan a successful and fun bachelor party. This includes top 10 lists of hot hotels, restaurants, or clubs in the desired city, as well as organizational tips to ensure a great time.

Bachelor10.com is also for guys planning any other trip where they want a male perspective. Think of Bachelor10 as an online aggregator of travel destinations where guys can be guys. The site works best when readers voice their opinions and argue with each other about the best places to travel.

New cities, categories, venues, tips, and features will be launched over time to meet the demanding needs of guys everywhere.

Bachelor10.com was founded by a group of 30-something guys whoâ€™ve attended countless bachelor parties, lived at some point in most of the major USA cities combined, and wanted to help guys create the best party ever.
